channel.title: Project Black Water
channel.description:
[center]Project Black Water
All right so I am looking for a few of the following: Web Developers Temp Host Gave Developers Staff
Okay so Project Black Water is a RSPS server/community that is owned, programmed and ran by people who do all the work they do is cause they enjoy it.
I am stuck between Militus(317) or, Demethium/TorvaPK637(639) as the base. Both have so much capability to be great. My personal choice is the 317 but after messing around with the 637/639 I do enjoy it.
This will be a serious (kinda) project. If you want to be a part of it, you can't just bullshit around cause it's for free. Course, eventually we will get donations and when that time comes I will give 60% to host, and the other 40% to rest of dev team cause I am doing this for the love and learning experience of it all.
Skype= joshisadmin
FAQs. Can we change the name? no
Can we try both sources and see what we like better? yes
Do i have any experience running a server? yes [/center]
Note: I do have a silly username. I do have few post. After a year of not running a rsps, I had totally forgot about moparscape or the email i used// :(

item.title: Project Black Water

item.description:
@MATT_IS_GAY wrote:

[center]Project Black Water

All right so I am looking for a few of the following:
Web Developers
Temp Host
Gave Developers
Staff

Okay so Project Black Water is a RSPS server/community that is owned, programmed and ran by people who do all the work they do is cause they enjoy it.

I am stuck between Militus(317) or, Demethium/TorvaPK637(639) as the base. Both have so much capability to be great. My personal choice is the 317 but after messing around with the 637/639 I do enjoy it.

This will be a serious (kinda) project. If you want to be a part of it, you can’t just bullshit around cause it’s for free. Course, eventually we will get donations and when that time comes I will give 60% to host, and the other 40% to rest of dev team cause I am doing this for the love and learning experience of it all.

Skype= joshisadmin

FAQs.
Can we change the name?
no

Can we try both sources and see what we like better?
yes

Do i have any experience running a server?
yes
[/center]

Note:
I do have a silly username. I do have few post. After a year of not running a rsps, I had totally forgot about moparscape or the email i used//
